solution_line_template: The number of flowers in Peter’s garden is {amanda_flowers} * {peter_multiplier} = <<{amanda_flowers}*{peter_multiplier}={peter_flowers}>>{peter_flowers} flowers.
The number of flowers left after he gave his brother {flowers_given} flowers is {peter_flowers} – {flowers_given} = <<{peter_flowers}-{flowers_given}={flowers_left}>>{flowers_left} flowers.
